SELECT device_product.id, device_product.`name`, device_product.note, device_product.can_control, device_product.type, device_product.create_time, device_product.update_time, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM device_device WHERE device_device.product_id = device_product.id ) AS deviceCount FROM device_product WHERE 1 = 1
AND device_product.`name` LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
